BBEX3.A.RWF.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Rwanda  / EUR 1 = RWF ... (middle)
Source: Banque Nationale du Rwanda, Kigali
Methodology: Until 2004, calculated on the basis of month-end buying and selling rates, from 2005 on the basis of mid-month and month-end buying and selling rates.
